snippet.title: RAIMAIS (ARCADE -  FULL GAME)
snippet.description:
Zeus presents Raimas for the Arcade, an ok game from the golden era of arcade gaming which must not be forgotten alongside the programmers that were involved in making this game.

Year of release: 1988

Not many have heard of this game but I discovered it whilst searching for old arcade games on the internet and at the time there wasn't a longplay of it so I decided to play it all the way through.
32 levels await you and the idea is you must collect all the dots (or whatever you want to call them) on each level whilst avoiding all the speeding baddies,...which as you can see I didn't do a very good job of lol.
It's an ok game but after around 10 or so levels I fear you will lose interest, get passed all 32 levels and you are then greeted with an ending.

I hope all you retro gaming fans enjoy this upload enough to subscribe (please also click the notification bell to receive notifications of all my new videos) and possibly consider a small donation to the channel via the Paypal icon as this helps me to continue contributing to the channel.

Please note: NONE of my game uploads are emulated in any way whatsoever, they are 100% original recordings by myself taken directly from the original hardware the game was intended for, that way you know you're watching the real thing (but not in this upload, MAME emulation).
I will also always state whether i am using any cheats in the game, if not mentioned then i am not using any.
Check out my channel (http://www.youtube.com/user/ZEUSDAZ/videos), dedicated to gamers who loved the games of yesteryear.

Switch to 480p for best video quality and feel free to leave comments on my channel and vid's.

Keeping the memory of the Arcade games alive!!!
